text: The Night Before Christmas () is a 1913 Russian silent comedy movie directed by Ladislas Starevich.Первые отечественные фильмы возвратят на большой экранНочь перед Рождеством It stars Ivan Mozzhukhin, Olga Obolenskaya, and Lidiya Tridenskaya. The movie is based on the 1832 tale of the same name by Nikolai Gogol. == Actors == * Ivan Mozzhukhin as Devil (as Ivan Mosjoukine) * Olga Obolenskaya as Oksana * Lidiya Tridenskaya as Solokha * Petr Lopukhin as Vakula (as P. Laphukin) * Aleksandr Kheruvimov as Golova * Pavel Knorr as Chub == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:Christmas movies Category:1913 comedy movies
title: The Night Before Christmas (1913 movie)
